components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description: Creating a new project shows up the message [ERROR] Missing required option "--username". Even though the proxy settings has been done.
fields.summary: [ERROR] Missing required option "--username" when creating new project on Windows 7

comments.body:
Hello Vikash,

Have you tried the following?

You need to add the following ports to the firewall's white list
https://api.appcelerator.net (ports 80 and 443) Used for login

http://studio.appcelerator.com (ports 80 and 443) Used for the dashboard

http://download.appcelerator.com (ports 80 and 443) Used for software updates
(from https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/devsup/Using+Titanium+Behind+a+Proxy)

Try adding these ports to your firewall's white list and let me know if this fixes your problem. Additionally, try checking the status of your login by running `titanium status` paste the output here.

If the output does NOT include 'You are currently logged in as xxxxxs@xxxxxx.xxx' then run 'titanium login'

Regards,
Carter
